original_title: Serendib Flour Mills champions SLIM National Sales Awards 2025 as Official Nutritional Partner
original_body_lines: Nourishing and supporting professional sales excellence, Serendib Flour Mills Limited (SFML) is partnering the SLIM National Sales Awards 2025 as the Official Nutritional Partner.

SFML is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Dubai-headquartered Al Ghurair, one of the leading diversified family businesses in the United Arab Emirates (UAE). For the past 16 years, SFML has been a trusted cornerstone of Sri Lanka’s food industry, playing a pivotal role in the food security of the country, driven by the overarching purpose of ‘Nourishing the Nation,’ and

The partnership was formalized at a ceremony held at the Serendib Flour Mills, corporate office. The event was attended by Vijay Sharma, CEO, Kalinga Wijesekara, Director Brand and Corporate Communication and Faizal Deen, Assistant Manager Brand from Serendib Flour Mills. Enoch Perera, Vice President Events & Sustainability, Chamil Wickremasinghe – Chief Executive Officer- SLIM, Gangani Liyanage, Head of Events & Sustainability and Avishka Attanayeke, Junior Executive Events & Sustainability represented SLIM.
